trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of the **Close** button of a small window.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the **Close** button of a small window, such as a tool window.
Gets a visual style element that represents the small **Close** button in the disabled state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the small **Close** button in the disabled state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the small **Close** button in the hot state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the small **Close** button in the hot state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the small **Close** button in the normal state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the small **Close** button in the normal state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the small **Close** button in the pressed state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton.Pressed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the small **Close** button in the pressed state.
